RETELL_TRUNK_NAME.description: The name of the Carrier you configured in jambonz towards Retell

RETELL_SIP_CLIENT_USERNAME.description: The name of the Client you configured in jambonz for Retell

PSTN_TRUNK_NAME.description: The name of the Carrier you configured in jambonz towards your SIP service provider

DEFAULT_COUNTRY.description: The 2 *CHARACTER* ISO-3166 Country Code for your phone number eg US, GB, ES, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2 for values

OVERRIDE_FROM_USER.description: Value to use for From header in outbound calls to PSTN, original From callerID sent by Retell will be added to a Diversion header, use when Sipgate is your carrier

PASS_REFER.description: When retell sends a cold transfer this is a SIP REFER, if true the REFER will be passed to the originating carrier, if false we will make a new dial from jambonz using the carrier
